comments: Sochan (SAS) brings his right arm forward when marginal contact occurs with Bridges' (CHA) right arm as Bridges gains control of the pass.
Jones (SAS) briefly has his arm around Bridges' (CHA) midsection before quickly sliding it off.
Sochan (SAS) brings his hands forward prior to marginal contact occurring with Ball's (CHA) front along the sideline.
Collins (SAS) fails to fully clear the lane and is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Jones (SAS) is retreating in Bridges' (CHA) path and absorbs the contact initiated by Bridges as they come together during the drive.
Collins (SAS) briefly has his left arm on top of Washington's (CHA) left arm and disengages as the entry pass into the post is made.
Washington (CHA) is bringing his arms into a vertical position and absorbs the marginal contact that occurs with Collins' (SAS) left arm during Collins' upward shooting motion.
Jones (SAS) moves forward slightly prior to marginal body contact occurring with Ball (CHA) at the end of the drive.

Sochan (SAS) is moving toward the perimeter with his left arm brought outward and marginal contact occurs with Rozier's (CHA) left arm after Rozier has already started to lose control of the ball on his own during the drive.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Rozier's (CHA) right hand touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Sochan (SAS) establishes a wide screening position in Rozier's (CHA) path and, following the initial upper body contact, further marginal lower body contact occurs as Rozier moves over the screen.
Collins (SAS) extends and delivers contact to Rozier's (CHA) side as the pick is set
Bridges (CHA) is firming up over his left foot in Jones' (SAS) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the screen.
Ball's (CHA) left hand brushes Collins' (SAS) left leg and marginal contact occurs as Ball turns the corner during the drive.

Collins' (SAS) left hand comes forward prior to marginal contact occurring with Ball's (CHA) left arm after Ball's gather. Collins then brings his left arm down as he contests the driving shot attempt and marginal contact occurs with Ball's left arm after the release.
Johnson (SAS) establishes himself in Rozier's (CHA) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick.
Martin (CHA) legally contests Vassell's (SAS) jump shot attempt.

Washington (CHA) and Collins (SAS) engage and quickly disengage with one another after the release of the jump shot attempt. Washington's right arm then grazes the side of Collins' head as he raises both arms up to retrieve the rebound. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Johnson (SAS) steps forward and initiates body contact that causes Washington (CHA) to become dislodged.
Johnson (SAS) brushes Ball's (CHA) left arm and marginal contact occurs prior to the start of Ball's dribble.
Sochan (SAS) commits a take foul on Miller (CHA). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Martin (CHA) is turning away from Vassell (SAS) when marginal contact occurs with Vassell's front as Vassell starts his upward shooting motion.
Johnson (SAS) commits a take foul on Rozier (CHA). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
